about_the_game:
Please note that the text in this DLC is only available in Traditional Chinese.


Thank you for your support for Handyman Legend!
Originally, we planned to bring out the artbook together with the game,
but due to our lack of experience, it is only now being released. We hope you can forgive us!

The content includes some publicly released promotional images as well as some character designs and sketches,
which allow you to get to know some content that is not in the game. The artbook contains a total of 20 pages and we hope you will enjoy it!



Furthermore, not purchasing the artbook will not affect any experience in the game. If you would like to support us, please purchase it!

Thank you everyone!!

Best regards,
The SupaShinKen Team

※Here are the steps:
1. Right-click on Handyman Legend in your library and select Properties.
2. Click on Local Files and then Browse.
3. Select the Handyman Legend Digital Art Book.

content_descriptors.notes:
Please notice:

This game contains nudity and sexual content, which included:
* Seminude and nude 2D graphics
* Animated sex acts (pixelated style)
* Sex act sence (CG Art)
* Sexually suggestive contact
* Non-consensual sex
* NTR

All character depicted are over the age of 18.
